Mar 23, 2015

Make a Hit with Smooth Highrise to Insightly Migration

Free Ebook Inside: ‘Why, Where and How to Migrate Your CRM?’

During the last decades, companies take the overwhelming advantage of CRM solutions. However, there are much more elements behind the secret of a burgeoning business. CRM system is a fusion of tools and strategic approaches to the effective performance. So, it helps you to reveal the potential of your business in full scale.

Interrelation of CRM Usage and Productivity

With CRM, you can facilitate the cumbersome daily routine and spare efforts on communication with customers. The increase in productivity will be immense and obvious if your marketing and sales managers work with CRM solution and regularly enter real-time, accurate information into the system.

The choice of CRM platforms are impressing and gives a spare for selecting the most suitable to your business objectives. Highrise and Insightly are the affordable cloud solutions on which a lot of vendors rely on. Nevertheless, these solutions have distinctive feature sets and, sometimes, business owners prefer to migrate from Highrise to Insightly.

Highrise vs Insightly: Tools for Business Growth

Recently, cloud CRM became popular among SMBs due to cutting-edge functionality and cost-effectiveness. Highrise and Insightly have captured the attention of a large audience with free plans and budget-friendly pricing policies along with options for effective performance and fast, high-quality service. But let’s compare them according to the following aspects

Question of Data Administration

With Highrise, you can manage separate clients, as well as companies and organizations, in the contact module. Also, you can add social media profiles and few custom fields. Insightly enables you with a bird-eye view of your clients via contacts and organization modules. Apart from social media integration, you can add extra fields or delete redundant. So, both solutions allow to run b2b and b2c business strategies.

Baseline CRM Features

Highrise provides you with task tool for managing the employee performance and tag option for adding vital information. Sales staff can keep track of the transaction status by means of deal feature, as well as you can monitor their performance.

Insightly offers you a workflow tool for facilitation the major processes, and tasks for increasing the productivity and reducing an average duration of a sale cycle. Project management helps to deal with the transactions and opportunity tool aids in revenue forecasting. Besides, Insightly provides you with the analytics for measuring the effectiveness of your staff, estimating ROI and advancing further project planning.

Personalization of the System

Ability to tailor system to your specific needs is equally important to the CRM scope of improvement. Highrise restricts customizations to adding several fields, theme change and downloading company’s logo. Insightly provides you with an extended option for system personalization — from custom fields adding to setting up reports and workflow conditions.

In conclusion, Highrise and Insightly are practical solutions that may align with your business objectives. So, you should draw up a strategy with clear and achievable goals before choosing CRM platform.

Initiate CRM Switch Wisely

If you are sure that Insightly is just what the doctor ordered, you should consider about migration mode. For those, who want to spare time and money, will find the automated service Data2CRM as a useful and beneficial option. This web-based solution may switch your records from Highrise to Insightly without programming, data importing, system downtime, as well as human interaction.

Flawless Highrise to Insightly Migration in 6 Steps

Step 1. Go to app.data2crm.com and accomplish a quick sign up.

Step 2. Define your Highrise URL and API token.

Step 3. Specify your Insightly CRM type and provide your API key.

Step 4. Choose CRM modules for migration to Insightly. You can switch accounts, contacts, tasks and opportunities.

Step 5. Run a free demo and evaluate Data2CRM in action. During this procedure, the service will transfer a limited amount of records from CRM modules you have selected.

Step 6. In case, you are satisfied with demo results, start your full Highrise to Insightly migration.

CRM switch is a meaningful and serious change for business running, but you shouldn’t waste your money on the overriding considerations. Just set up a free demo migration and see the work of the automated service and proceed with successful company advancement.
